about_the_game:
* Wizard War Online is an online role-playing game with many game modes and mini games.
* Game modes include Battle Arena, Broom Race and Air Ball Match.
* Each player sets up a room or logs into one of the rooms.
* If the room owner wishes, he can kick the players out of the room.
* When everyone presses the ready button, the room owner can start the game.
* Players can increase their levels by killing creatures or other players in the game.
* Improve your tactics, adjust your timing well and take your place on the leaderboard!


GAME MODES

Wizard War Online offers players an incredible flying experience. Flying with a broom has never been easier, thanks to the flight system that can be directed with mouse movements. Get ready to have a completely different experience in the air thanks to the flight sensitivity settings that you can change according to your preferences in the settings menu.
* Battle arena: A large battlefield focused on tactics and timing.
* Broom race: Show your opponents how well you can race with the broom.
* Air ball match: Pass the ball through the opponent's goal by performing unique maneuvers in the air and score points for your team.



MINI GAMES

* Mini ball rolling: Roll the balls on the platform and earn high scores with the right timing.
* Mini battle arena: A battlefield where you can attack your opponents and kill creatures on the field.
* Mini ball field: A small field where you can play fast air ball matches.
